bio.name: Greg
bio.welcomeMessage:
Once upon a time I built websites with framesets and lots of help from Macromedia.

The web has evolved a great deal since those days and thankfully, so have my skills.

jobs.title: Jr. Full-Stack Software Engineer
jobs.description: Graduated from Launch Academy's 18-week Full-stack programming bootcamp.

jobs.title: @Self-Employed
jobs.description: Front-end development for agencies. ExpressionEngine / CMS builds, maintenance. Personal projects.

jobs.description: Managed website. Designed and developed property lead generation site

jobs.description: Managed website and app builds. Designed project scopes and budgets.

projects.title: Text Twister
projects.description: Anagram puzzle game where players unscramble letters and solve words before time runs out.
